sentences.sContent: Skilled craftsmen, such as carpenters, are in great demand.
sentences.sCn: 对木工之类的熟练工匠需求量很大。

sentences.sContent: The company is fortunate to have such highly skilled workers.
sentences.sCn: 公司有这样一些技能熟练的工人真是幸运。

sentences.sContent: ...whereas older skilled folk are working longer...
...Rapid technological advance has raised the incomes of the highly skilled while squeezing those of the unskilled...
...the growing gap between the skilled and the unskilled...
...Some simplistically attribute the decline in our public education system to the drain of skilled students by private schools...

synos.tran: 熟练的；有技能的；需要技能的

words.tran: （英）熟练的；灵巧的；技术好的（等于skillful）

trans.tranOther: someone who is skilled has the training and experience that is needed to do something well
